record.id: field.name="auto.post" and file.name="slamodulecontrol" and term="Auto post outage information" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: auto.post - slamodulecontrol - Auto post outage information - - en
record.field.name: auto.post
record.file.name: slamodulecontrol

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), automatically posts outage information to the outage table for the Configuration Items for the record being closed.
If cleared (set to false), Service Manager will prompt The operator who closes the record to verify the start and end times of the outage before posting the outage information.
